price: Mwenyezi Mungu ameandika: Hapana shaka Mimi na Mtume wangu tutashinda. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye nguvu, Mwenye kushinda.
arabic: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu amekata hukumu: Bila ya shaka Mimi na Mtume wangu tutashinda. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye nguvu zilizo timia, hashindwi na yeyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kataba al-lahu la-aghlibanna anā warusulī inna al-laha qawiyyun ʿazīzun
